price: 56. Jannat addal raba ma-tammoysan (Yallak meesitta moominiin kinnuk) naharsi rabay addunyal tammoyseeni akke waytek. Kaadu Yalli Jaciim deqsitta giráh digaalák ken catah.
arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِلَّا ٱلۡمَوۡتَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā al-mawta illā al-mawtata al-ūlā wawaqāhum ʿadhāba al-jaḥīmi
